Question: Heraeus Deutschland GmbH & Co. KG CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Heraeus Deutschland GmbH & Co. KG

Product: LEAD SKIN® AIR

- Dry-type conductive smart textile 
- Antibacterial, antiviral, corrosion-proof, and durable
- Effective in dry conditions and does not require gel or water
- Developed through dyeing technology by AI SILK® 
- Uses metal-free conductive polymer textile coating technology
- Provides unparalleled comfort for sensitive skin
- Exhibited at CES Las Vegas
- Ideal for sports and fitness apparel
Summary_cn:
Heraeus Deutschland GmbH & Co. KG

产品：LEAD SKIN® AIR

- 干式导电智能织物
- 具有抗菌、抗病毒、防腐蚀和耐用的特性
- 在干燥条件下有效，不需要凝胶或水
- 通过AI SILK®的染色技术开发
- 采用无金属导电聚合物纺织涂层技术
- 为敏感肌肤提供无与伦比的舒适感
- 在CES拉斯维加斯展出
- 球类和健身服装的理想选择
